overview: The album’s standout songs include the title track, ‘No Other Name’, which captures Hillsong Church’s current season of building on the foundations of the past three decades and 'pioneering again’, whilst continuing to lift up the One it all began with, Jesus. ‘This I Believe’ is a modern day expression of the statements of belief outlined in the ancient Apostles’ Creed. These are foundational truths that have unified Christians across the globe for centuries and continue to do so today.  The live DVD/Blu-Ray has been recorded at the Allphones Arena on Hillsong Conference 2014.
title: Hillsong - No Other Name
